sentences.en: A small group of youths stayed behind to heckle and shout abuse.
sentences.cn: 一小群小青年没走，在起哄、叫骂。

sentences.en: Behind the mocking laughter lurks a growing sense of unease.
sentences.cn: 嘲笑声的背后潜伏着一种越来越强烈的不安。

sentences.en: Elliott crossed the finish line just half a second behind his adversary.
sentences.cn: 埃利奥特跨过终点线时仅比对手落后半秒钟。

sentences.en: Europe was falling behind in the important field of computer technology.
sentences.cn: 欧洲在计算机技术这一重要领域落后了。

sentences.en: Evans had rheumatic fever, missed school and fell behind.
sentences.cn: 伊万斯得了风湿热，没去上课，功课也落下了。

sentences.en: Food production has already fallen behind the population growth.
sentences.cn: 粮食生产已经跟不上人口增长。

sentences.en: He could just about see the little man behind the counter.
sentences.cn: 他勉强能看到柜台后面的小个子男人。

sentences.en: He ordered them to stack up pillows behind his back.
sentences.cn: 他命令他们把几个枕头叠放在自己的背后。

sentences.en: He stole a glance at the clock behind her.
sentences.cn: 他偷偷地看了一眼她背后的钟。

sentences.en: I turned to speak to the person standing behind me.
sentences.cn: 我转身和站在我后面的那人说话。

sentences.en: It vexed me to think of others gossiping behind my back.
sentences.cn: 一想到别人在背后说我闲话，我就很恼火。

sentences.en: Jane shut the door behind her.
sentences.cn: 简随手关上身后的门。

sentences.en: Mark’s always behind the rest of his class in mathematics.
sentences.cn: 马克的数学成绩总是落在班上其他同学后面。

sentences.en: Rising into the hills behind are 800 acres of parkland.
sentences.cn: 往上延伸至后面小山的是800英亩的草木区。

sentences.en: She handed over a form, then bobbed down again behind a typewriter.
sentences.cn: 她递过来一张表格，随后又立刻埋头在打字机后面忙活起来。

sentences.en: She'd been caught from behind and hadn't a prayer of freeing herself.
sentences.cn: 有人从后面抓住她，她不可能脱身。

sentences.en: Shoppers took cover behind cars as police marksmen returned fire.
sentences.cn: 警方的射击手开火回击时，购物者们躲在汽车后面。

sentences.en: Someone could easily creep up behind us.
sentences.cn: 很可能有人跟在我们后面。

sentences.en: The car behind was hooting impatiently.
sentences.cn: 后面那辆车不耐烦地按着喇叭。

sentences.en: The child kept her eyes fixed on the wall behind him.
sentences.cn: 这个小女孩眼睛一直紧盯着他身后的那堵墙。

sentences.en: The manager was sitting behind a large desk.
sentences.cn: 经理坐在一张大办公桌的后面。

sentences.en: This victory lifts Ferguson’s team into fifth place, nine points behind leaders Norwich.
sentences.cn: 这场胜利使弗格森的球队升到了第五名，落后领先的诺里奇队九分。

sentences.en: Visitors see the painting from behind a plate glass window.
sentences.cn: 参观者隔着平板玻璃橱窗欣赏那幅画。

sentences.en: Warwicks leap to third in the table, 31 points behind leaders Essex.
sentences.cn: 沃里克队在排名中蹿升至第3名，落后领先的埃塞克斯队31分。

trans.tran_cn: 在…后面，留下来，丢下，积压

trans.tran_en: the part of your body that you sit on
at or towards the back of a thing or person

trans.tran_cn: 在…后面，是…产生的原因，落后于，支持，成为过去
trans.tran_en: at or towards the back of a thing or person
